member.name: F:Sitecore.Reporting.Core.Helpers.ReportingServicesPathLocator.registry
member.summary: A registry containing the mappings between service names and service paths.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Reporting.Core.Helpers.ReportingServicesPathLocator.Register(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a new service path in the locator.
member.param: The service's name. The name must be unique and non-empty.
member.exception: If the service name is null or empty; or if the service name is not unique

member.name: M:Sitecore.Reporting.Core.Helpers.ReportingServicesPathLocator.GetServicePath(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a service from the registry.
member.param: The name of the service to search in the registry. The name must be non-empty.
member.exception: If the service name is null or empty or the service is not registered in the registry.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Reporting.Core.Services.Hashing.Crc64HashAlgorithm
member.summary: Crc has a hight collisions rate so it must be used wisely

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes an implementation of the class.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Reporting.Core.Services.Hashing.Crc64HashAlgorithm.HashFinal
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Reporting.Core.Services.Hashing.Crc64HashAlgorithm.HashSize
member.summary: Gets the size, in bits, of the computed hash code.
member.returns: The size, in bits, of the computed hash code.
